scar

Class StorageTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • scar.StorageTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<Chunk>

    public class StorageTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<Chunk>
    Handles actual uploading and downloading of a chunk to a server

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageTask

        public StorageTask(IServer s,
                   Chunk c,
                   ChunkMeta meta,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   int type)
        Initializes this Storage Task to be run later on through a Java thread pool
        Parameters:
        s - The server for this task
        c - The chunk for this task
        meta - The chunk's meta data for this task
        name - the name of this chunk
        type - the type of task TYPE_STORE or TYPE_GET

    • Method Detail

      • call

        public Chunk call()
        Performs this storage task General algorithm:
        1. sleep for random period of time between 50ms-1050ms
        2. perform the upload/download
        3.1. If TYPE_STORE, set whether the upload was successful or not
        3.2. return the chunk if successful, only matters for TYPE_GET
        Specified by:
        call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<Chunk>
        Returns:
        The chunk downloaded in the case of a TYPE_GET. Return for a TYPE_STORE is meaningless.
